alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 7:40AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Livingston County through 845 AM EDT... At 738 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cohoctah, or 7 miles north of Fowlerville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall and low visibility for motorists. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cohoctah around 750 AM EDT. Oak Grove around 755 AM EDT. Howell around 800 AM EDT. Hartland around 820 AM EDT. Brighton around 825 AM EDT. South Lyon around 845 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Island Lake State Recreation Area, Chilson, Conway Township, Tyrone Township and Deerfield Township. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
